titles: The principles of the Christian religion explained in a brief commentary upon the church catechism. By William Wake, D.D. rector of St. James Westminster, and Chaplain in Ordinary to His Majesty.
author: Wake, William, 1657-1737.
publisher: printed for Richard Sare, at Grays-Inn Gate in Holborn,
notes: With errata at foot of p. 183, and a final advertisement on N4v.
Running title reads: The principles of the Christian religion explain'd.
Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London.
